ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This article was written in the scope of a research project entitled ‘4CHealth’ focusing on communication of climate change and health. It is a research project initiated by the Centre Virchow-Villermé for Public Health and the Institute for Public Health of the University of Heidelberg.

The authors thank all project members for their input and ideas.The authors also thank Jordan Schneider for creating the cartogram representing global publications on climate change and health. His knowledge and expertise were invaluable.
